Montipora capitata

Source: R/mcap.R
mcap.Rd

A laser scan of a coral colony.

Usage

mcap

Format

mesh3d object with 5568 vertices, 10939 triangles.

Examples

library(rgl)
plot3d(mcap)

3D plot
